name: Pizza
steps: Preheat oven to 475°F (245°C).
Roll out the pizza dough on a floured surface.
Spread tomato sauce over the dough.
Top with mozzarella and drizzle olive oil.
Bake for 10–15 minutes until cheese is bubbly.
Garnish with basil before serving.

name: Salad
steps: Wash and chop the vegetables.
Toss lettuce, tomato, and cucumber in a bowl.
Drizzle with olive oil and vinegar.
Add salt and pepper to taste.
Serve immediately.

name: Sweet Potato
steps: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Peel and cube the sweet potato.
Toss with olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Spread on a baking sheet.
Roast for 25–30 minutes until tender.

name: Gnocchi
steps: Boil and mash the potatoes.
Mix with flour, egg, and salt to form dough.
Roll into ropes and cut into small pieces.
Boil until gnocchi float to the top.
Serve with sauce and Parmesan.

name: Pot Roast
steps: Season and sear the beef on all sides.
Add chopped vegetables to the pot.
Pour in beef broth and cover.
Simmer on low heat for 3–4 hours.
Serve hot with vegetables.

name: Lasagna
steps: Cook the noodles and brown the ground beef.
Layer noodles, sauce, ricotta, and mozzarella in a dish.
Repeat layers and top with cheese.
Bake at 375°F (190°C) for 45 minutes.
Let cool slightly before serving.

name: Hamburger
steps: Grill or pan-fry the beef patty.
Toast the burger bun if desired.
Assemble with lettuce, tomato, cheese, and patty.
Add condiments as desired.
Serve immediately.

name: Pad Thai
steps: Soak rice noodles in warm water.
Stir-fry tofu/shrimp and scramble the egg.
Add noodles and tamarind sauce.
Stir in bean sprouts and peanuts.
Serve hot with lime wedges.

name: Almonds
steps: Measure a serving of almonds.
Serve raw or lightly roasted as desired.

name: Sarma
steps: Mix ground meat, rice, onion, and spices.
Place filling in cabbage leaves and roll tightly.
Stack in a pot and cover with water or broth.
Simmer on low for 1.5–2 hours.
Serve warm.

name: Bacon
steps: Place bacon strips in a cold pan.
Cook over medium heat until crispy.
Drain on paper towels.
Serve hot or crumble over dishes.

name: Hot Dog
steps: Boil or grill the sausage.
Warm the bun if desired.
Place sausage in the bun.
Add toppings like mustard, ketchup, and relish.
Serve immediately.

name: Chocolate Cake
steps: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Mix dry and wet ingredients separately, then combine.
Pour batter into a greased cake pan.
Bake for 30–35 minutes.
Cool and frost before serving.

name: Wheat Bread
steps: Mix flour, yeast, salt, and water.
Knead dough and let rise until doubled.
Shape into a loaf and place in a pan.
Bake at 375°F (190°C) for 30–35 minutes.
Cool before slicing.

name: Orange
steps: Peel the orange.
Separate into slices.
Serve fresh.

name: Banana
steps: Peel the banana.
Eat fresh or slice for topping.

name: Yogurt
steps: Heat milk to 180°F (82°C), then cool to 110°F (43°C).
Add live yogurt cultures.
Let ferment for 6 8 hours.
Chill before serving.
Add fruit or sweeteners if desired.
